display_information.name: Superset
display_information.description: Superset's supercharged AI coding assistant - Spawn cloud agents, plan tasks, do code reviews, and more
display_information.long_description:
Supercharge your coding workflows with Superset, an AI Coding agent. Spin up a cloud sandbox, organize your work, open worktrees on your desktop app, or get fast answers. Just start a DM with Superset for instant access without leaving Slack.
Superset can make mistakes. Please take care with prompts.
